archived.name: Personal Dashboard Web Application
archived.description: Build a beautiful, modern Personal Dashboard with weather widget, quick notes, task manager, pomodoro timer, and quick links. Full-stack with React/TypeScript frontend and Node.js/Express/SQLite backend.
verification: Frontend builds without errors
Backend starts and responds to health check
Weather widget displays current conditions
Notes can be created, edited, and deleted
Tasks can be added, completed, and removed
Pomodoro timer counts down correctly
Quick links are customizable
Responsive design works on mobile
Data persists in SQLite database

archived.name: Design Revamp with Micro-Interactions
archived.description: Revamp the Personal Dashboard design with a fresh, modern aesthetic using the frontend-design plugin. Add polished micro-interactions using motion.dev (motion/react) - including hover effects, tap feedback, smooth transitions, layout animations, spring physics, and scroll-triggered animations.
verification: All 5 widgets have updated, cohesive design
Motion library installed and configured
Hover effects on all interactive elements
Tap/click feedback on buttons and cards
Smooth transitions when switching widget states
Layout animations for list items (tasks, notes, links)
Enter/exit animations for modals and new items
Responsive design maintained on all screen sizes
No performance degradation (animations run at 60fps+)
Build completes without errors

technicalNotes.designApproach: Use frontend-design plugin for distinctive, production-grade interface

archived.name: Modal Styling & UX Improvements
archived.description: Ensure popup modals are correctly styled and inline with the Crystalline Noir design system. Improve UX with proper focus management, form validation feedback, and consistent styling across all widget modals (Notes, Tasks, Pomodoro Settings, Quick Links).
verification: All modal form inputs use consistent noir/amber styling
Form labels and placeholders are readable with proper contrast
Buttons inside modals match the app's Button component styling
Focus states are visible and accessible
Form validation provides clear feedback
Modal content is properly scrollable for long forms
Close button (X) and Escape key work correctly
Tab order is logical within modals
Mobile responsive layout works correctly
Playwright tests validate modal functionality

technicalNotes.testingApproach: Use Playwright MCP for automated UI testing
technicalNotes.designSystem: Crystalline Noir with dark amber (#b45309) accents
